vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Γεδεών, ὁ, indecl. in LXX and NT, in FlJ, Ant., see 6, 3 and 4 -ῶνος (Heb. גִּדְעוֹן),
Gideon (Jdg.6-8): Heb.11:32.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.6.11;
son of: Joash (H3101);
father of: Jether (H3500), Abimelech (H0040H) and Jotham (H3147); also called Jerubbaal at Jdg.6.32; 7.1; 8.29,35; 9.1,2,5,16,19,24,28,57; 1xJerubbesheth at 2Sa.11.21;
§ Gideon, "one who cuts, hacks"
Gideon, (Judges 6-8), (Proper name), indeclinable, Heb. 11:32*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基甸 这个陽性專有名詞在 希伯來字的意思是 "砍下"
將以色列人由米甸人的控制下解放出來的士師 (來 11:32)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
基甸 这个阳性专有名词在 希伯来字的意思是 "砍下"
将以色列人由米甸人的控制下解放出来的士师 (来 11:32)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ghê-đê-ôn nghĩa là « người chiến sĩ hay là người chặt hạ thần tượng Ba-anh » Xem H1439.
